notes.title: Institutional Review Board Statement
notes.p: Experimental protocols were approved by the Animal Research Committee of Kyoto University, Kyoto, Japan (approval number: 20-14). Handling and care of the animals complied with the institutional guidelines, in accordance with the Fundamental Guidelines for the Proper Conduct of Animal Experiments and Related Activities in Academic Research Institutions under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology, Japan (2006).
